headline: Coterra Energy price target lowered to $35 from $37 at Goldman Sachs
summary: Goldman Sachs lowered the firm’s price target on Coterra Energy (CTRA) to $35 from $37 and keeps a Buy rating on the shares. The firm is updating its model after the company’s Q4 results last month while noting that given the outlook for broader commodity and market uncertainty, either defensive exposure or idiosyncratic cost improvement stories can create differentiation within the broader E&P complex, the analyst tells investors in a research note.
